document_data.name: Shepherd's Valley
document_data.mainbody: '''Shepherd's Valley''' was a small and obscure community that consisted of [[halfling]]s and [[gnome]]s that existed as early as [[881 DR]].
document_data.Defenses: Shepherd's Valley had its watch broken into Day Watch and Night Watch with the captains of each passing along the item that was the village's main claim to fame, the ''[[Helm of the Trusted Defender]]''.
document_data.History: Shepherd's Valley was mainly known for the magical [[helmet]] usable only by gnomes and halflings that was created there. Eventually, more than four hundred years after it was created, the helmet found its way to an unlikely place, [[Kuldahar]] of [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Notable Locations: * [[Gibling Armstrong's Curious Shoppe]]: the store that owned the ''helm of the Trusted Defender'' for some time after it was traded away by one of the town's watch captains.
document_data.Inhabitants: * [[Pheldon Tock]]: the infamous watch captain who traded the ''helm of the Trusted Defender'' to Gibling Armstrong's Curious Shoppe.
